description: [``botocore``] Introduces CustomEntity as part of the UserUnion data type. This field is used to indicate the entity who is performing the API action.
[``botocore``] Amazon KDS now supports tagging and attribute-based access control (ABAC) for enhanced fan-out consumers.
[``botocore``] AWS End User Messaging has added MONITOR and FILTER functionality to SMS Protect.
[``botocore``] Add support for anonymous user access for Q Business applications
[``botocore``] Introduced support for P5en instance types on SageMaker Studio for JupyterLab and CodeEditor applications.
[``botocore``] SageMaker Metrics Service now supports FIPS endpoint in all US and Canada Commercial regions.

[``botocore``] This release adds support for just-In-time node access in AWS Systems Manager. Just-in-time node access enables customers to move towards zero standing privileges by requiring operators to request access and obtain approval before remotely connecting to nodes managed by the SSM Agent.
[``botocore``] This release adds API support for the connection recording GUI Connect feature of AWS Systems Manager
